name: Wanderland (itch) (Palaeolak)
description:
Hi, it's your friendly neighbourhood SpiderDan here. I'm releasing this, a level from an upcoming game I'm working on. 

I just wanted to put it out and let people tinker away with it while I'm busy working on the other levels, but also, I feel like it could hold up by itself as a standalone experience.

There are very few game mechanics to concern yourself with here, and there's also little by way of an objective to worry about, for it is simply a walking sim... albeit one with a few hidden secrets for you to uncover at your own pace.

Peace, Dan (Palaeolak)
